metadata.name: Perpetuum Mobile#2
metadata.description: Original Illustration to the Children's Book “Perpetuum Mobile”. The book was published in December 2008.  The author Jane Quartz combines a strong scientific background with a gift for creative insight and sophisticated use of artistic skills. Jane, who holds a Ph.D. from Yale University, has many years of experience in psychological research on children’s development, cognitive functioning, and practical intelligence. The generous gift from the Jane Quartz’s Family Foundation.
